name: Block Competition
description:
We present to your attention the game where you will take place puzzles in the style of blocks. The game starts inside the tower, on the topmost floor and the player has to get out of it, having solved a number of riddles. Turn on your savvy and you will definitely find the right solution.
Main Features
-Graphics made in the blocks' style
-Different puzzles
-System of construction
-Good soundtrack
